title: APDU
extract: The APDU (Application Protocol Data Unit) is the communication unit between a reader and a card. The structure of an APDU is defined by the ISO 7816 standards. There are two categories of APDUs: command APDUs and response APDUs.May 7, 2012
extract_html: The APDU (Application Protocol Data Unit) is the communication unit between a reader and a card. The structure of an APDU is defined by the ISO 7816 standards. There are two categories of APDUs: command APDUs and response APDUs.May 7, 2012
